# SwagHost

Our last offers were posted exactly one year ago and we thought you may like new offers, so here it is!

Do you need a server with quality? We have the best servers you'll ever get! We don't have a website because we don't have the time for that. Leave an comment here if you want a server!

## Offers

**LET1** (dedicated)
<pre>
1 x 233Mhz CPU
56 KB Ram
64Kbps unlimited* bandwidth (shared)!
2.2 MB disk space
$48/month
</pre>

**LET2** (shared hosting)
<pre>
32 KB disk space
2Kbps unlimited* bandwidth (shared)!
sentora control panel
$48/year
</pre>
